snippet.title: PRIM Gameplay Teaser (made for German Computer Game Award 2020)
snippet.description:
Back PRIM on Kickstarter NOW: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/prim-game/prim-a-2d-adventure-game-about-deaths-daughter



Hey Reapers!
This year, we were nominated for the German Computer Game Award as "Best Prototype".
This is the gameplay footage video we put together for the award show.


How do you like the look and feel of our game so far?
Let us know in the comments!


Don't forget to subscribe to our mailing list on www.prim-game.com to be the first to play our demo, coming out October 2020!
